title: Teamwork
brief_description: Six means by which cooperation can be achieved are illustrated by a group of high school students planning a dance. Leadership, bargaining, trickery, exploitation, compromise, democratic cooperation are shown as students complete arrangements. Introduction and summary show out-of-school examples of same methods.
